movies.title: The Towering Inferno
movies.plot: At the opening party of a colossal—but poorly constructed—office building, a massive fire breaks out, threatening to destroy the tower and everyone in it.

events.title: the tallest building in the world starts burning

movies.title: The Missiles of October
movies.plot: Based in part on Robert F. Kennedy's book, "Thirteen Days," this film profiles the Kennedy Administration's actions during the Cuban Missile Crisis.
movies.awards: Won 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 1 win & 8 nominations.

events.title: President Kennedy is shown images of the missiles
an agreement is made between John F. Kennedy and Nikita Khrushchev to end the stand-off

movies.title: Miracles Still Happen
movies.plot: A seventeen-year-old girl is the sole survivor of a plane crash in the Amazon.
